Automatically replace hotbar 1 when a fashion accessory is equipped.
Automatically replace hotbar 1 with pet hotbar when mounted.

Display both pet hotbar and hotbar 1.
Enable WXHB with simultaneous <CommandIcon(14)/> and <CommandIcon(15)/> double tap.

Remove dim effect from unequippable gear in the Armoury Chest.
Sort items into sections based on category.

Store all newly obtained items in the Armoury Chest.

Display error messages when actions fail.
Select notification sounds when receiving a message.

Settings_System Configuration_Display_Ap: Apply Change to All UI Components
Settings_System Configuration_Display_Li: Limit FPS when away from keyboard.
Limit frame rate when client is inactive.
Settings_System Configuration_Display_Re: Recommended Level: × is not visible / ◯ is just visible
Settings_System Configuration_Display_Sc: Scales the UI for better viewing on high resolution displays.
Settings_System Configuration_Gamepad Se: Compatible controllers can utilize rumble and playback of sound effects. (<Gui(63)/>DirectX 11 is required for this feature.)
Keep gamepad enabled when client is inactive.
Settings_System Configuration_Graphics_B: Blur the graphics around an object in motion. (Radial Blur)
Settings_System Configuration_Graphics_N: Naturally darken the edges of the screen. (Limb Darkening)
Settings_System Configuration_Graphics_U: Use low-detail models on distant object shadows. (LOD)
Use low-detail models on distant objects. (LOD)
Settings_System Configuration_Mouse_Allo: Allow resolution changes via mouse drag.
Settings_System Configuration_Mouse_Limi: Limit mouse operation to game window.
Settings_System Configuration_Other Sett: Switch online status to Camera Mode while active.
Switch to idling camera when auto-AFK activates.

Settings_System Configuration_Sound_Enab: Enable city–state BGM in residential areas.
Settings_System Configuration_Sound_Imme: Immerse Gamepack is not installed. Select the website button to download.
Settings_System Configuration_Sound_Play: Play sounds when window is not active.
Play system sounds while waiting for Duty Finder.
Settings_System Configuration_Sound_Spat: Spatial Audio (<Gui(63)/>DirectX 11 is required to enable this feature.)
Settings_System Configuration_Theme Sett: Choose your preferred color scheme. Certain UI elements are not affected by this change.  ※You must log in again for changes to take effect.
